attributes.title: Shiva Sutras, The Manual for Enlightenment www.LifBliss.org
attributes.description: From the works of Enlighetened Master Paramahamsa Nithyananda.  In this talk Nithyananda  expounds on Shiva Sutras which are techniques given by Shiva to Devi to directly experience enlightenment.  Nithyananda compares Gita with Shiva Sutras.  Gita has a little bit of shastras, stotras and sutras.  The danger is you may miss the essence.  With Shiva Sutras you cannot miss the truth.  It is a fool proof technology for enlightenment.  This clip is taken from discourse titled Breath -- Key to Experience which may be ordered at www.AnandaGalleria.com.
